about_the_game:
Stay In the Know - Add to Your Wishlist Now!



You're in a band of mutant cats who have been hidden from the world since they were born. These feline warriors, once confined in secret government labs, now find the outside world so exhilarating that they don’t want to go back to their old lives. To secure their freedom and carve out a territory they can call their own you must lead them through the perilous, zombie-infested County of Ravinbrook.

The government, desperate to deal with the zombie outbreak and get rid of their "unstable" creations, has sent you to Ravinbrook since humans can’t enter the town. As you explore this dynamic and ever-changing environment, you’ll face hordes of undead, challenging bosses, and hidden secrets.

Your mission is to conquer the central castle of Ravinbrook, the epicenter of the zombie outbreak. To get there, you’ll need to navigate through the countryside and suburbs, overcoming countless dangers along the way. Use your agility, cunning, and a variety of weapons and abilities to survive and thrive.


🌩️ Procedural Weather: In Cats Kill Zombies, you not only have procedural level generation, but you have procedural weather as well. But don't you think that this is an aesthetic feature, each weather pattern has its own effects in gameplay, liquids will freeze in the snow, fires will be put down in the rain but will burn faster if it's a hot day, and electricity will spread through rain puddles

💥 Destruction: The environment in Cats Kill Zombies is very dynamic, making a lot of destruction and carnage possible.

🐾 Kittens !!: Take control of quirky kittens, each with a unique personality and special abilities.

🔄 Procedural Levels: Every run in Cats Kill Zombies is a new adventure! Procedurally generated levels ensure that no challenge is the same as before.

⚔️ Progression and Customization: As you face the undead, gain skill points to evolve your abilities, choosing strategic upgrades that more align with your playstyle. Find devastating weapons throughout the map or grab new grenades with different effects from the shop.

🔓 Unlocks and Variety: Explore a range of characters, each bringing new tactics and strategies. Every time you unlock a new character, a new dimension is added to the game, encouraging you to try different styles and approaches.

name: Cats Kill Zombies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: In this fast-paced action roguelike, mutant cats hidden from the world for years find that life outside is so cool, they don’t want to go back home. For that, you'll have to fight through and conquer the heart of the zombie-infested County of Ravinbrook. It's the only way to Catland
